ProjectTitle: (Re)defining the origin and cellular niche of melanoma stem cells
InitialFeedbackHistory: 25/07/2022 [REDACTED] mention under 7 the sharing of personally identifiable genetic and phenotypic data in EGA but under 3 you indicate that you don't collect personal data, please update section 3 and apply for privacy approval if you do collect personal data (www.uzleuven.be/nl/clinical-trial-center/ctc-gdpr-questionnaire) for more information https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/studpers/index. [REDACTED] you don't collect personal data please have a look at the EMBL-EBI submission wizard to find a more suitable repository: www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/. [REDACTED] data for which there is no disciplinary repository available you can also use KU [REDACTED] RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) Please note that you don't have to describe sharing of scientific publications, a DMP focuses on the data underlying these publications. 25/07/2022 [REDACTED] mention under 7 the sharing of personally identifiable genetic and phenotypic data in EGA but under 3 you indicate that you don't collect personal data, please update section 3 and apply for privacy approval if you do collect personal data (www.uzleuven.be/nl/clinical-trial-center/ctc-gdpr-questionnaire) for more information https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/studpers/index.
